targets.expr: sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod="$pod", area="heap"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster",pod="$pod", area="heap"})

sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pod="$pod", area="nonheap"})*100/sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster",pod="$pod", area="nonheap"})

hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_creation_seconds_count{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pool="$hikaricp"}

hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_usage_seconds_count{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pool="$hikaricp"}

hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pool="$hikaricp"} / hikaricp_connections_acquire_seconds_count{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", pool="$hikaricp"}

irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster", uri!~".*actuator.*"}[5m]) > 0

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_bucket{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}[3m])) by (le, method, uri, status)) > 0

irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}[5m]) / irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}[5m]) > 0

histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_bucket{pod="$pod", app_kubernetes_io_part_of="$application", namespace="$namespace", cluster="$cluster"}[3m])) by (le, method, uri, status)) > 0
